title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4232 - Restrictions On Jockeys And Stable Employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4232 - Restrictions On Jockeys And Stable Employees

State Regulations
§ 4232.1 - Prohibitions; betting, interest in horses
§ 4232.2 - Owning race horse forbidden
§ 4232.3 - Riding against starter of contract employer
§ 4232.4 - No riding or training if suspended
§ 4232.5 - Contracts to be filed; salary stops on suspension
§ 4232.6 - Penalty for refusal to ride
§ 4232.7 - Retainers on priority basis
§ 4232.8 - Judges decide conflicting claims
§ 4232.9 - Hiring stable employees

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4232

Statutory authority: L. 1970, ch. 1023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
